name: Gettysburg: The Tide Turns - iPad & iPhone Wargaming
blurb: A simulation game commemorating the 150th anniversary of the Battle of Gettysburg, coming to iPad and iPhone from Shenandoah Studio.

rewards.reward:
PRIVATE JOHNNY REB
=============================
Thank you for your support! You will receive a Confederate themed iPad and/or iPhone wallpaper.
You will be listed as a Private in the game credits.

PRIVATE BILLY YANK
=============================
Thank you for your support! You will receive a Union themed iPad and/or iPhone wallpaper.
You will be listed as a Private in the game credits.

CORPORAL
=============================
You get the game! Plus both wallpapers for your iPad and/or iPhone and a Kickstarter supporter forum image. 
You will be listed as a Corporal in the game credits.

LIEUTENANT
=============================
You get the game! Plus a PDF version of Gettysburg as a board game, a PDF Player's Guide, and the Digital Rewards Pack which includes: two iPad and/or iPhone wallpapers, the game soundtrack, a ringtone, and a Kickstarter supporter forum image. 
You will be listed as a Lieutenant in the game credits.

VETERAN CAPTAIN
=============================
You get the game! Plus the official Shenandoah Studio T-shirt, a PDF version of Gettysburg as a board game, a PDF Player's Guide, and the Digital Rewards Pack. 
You will be listed as a Captain in the game credits.

NEWLY COMMISSIONED CAPTAIN
=============================
New to our games? This level is for you!
You get the game! Plus the Battle of the Bulge app (or a code for a friend), the El Alamein app, the Digital Rewards Pack, the Gettysburg Player's Guide PDF, and the Battle of the Bulge Player's and Design guides. 
You will be listed as a Captain in the game credits.

VETERAN MAJOR - VANGUARD SPECIAL
=============================
Get it while you can! Limited at this price!
You get the game and everything else on the VETERAN CAPTAIN level. Plus a Gettysburg: the Tide Turns T-shirt, a full-color printed Gettysburg game map, and access to the exclusive Kickstarter Gettysburg Tournament to be held one month after game launch featuring cash prizes.
You will be listed as a Major in the game credits.

VETERAN MAJOR - FLANKER SPECIAL ============================= Get it while you can! Limited at this price! You get the game and everything else on the VETERAN CAPTAIN level. Plus a Gettysburg: the Tide Turns T-shirt, a full-color printed Gettysburg game map, and access to the exclusive Kickstarter Gettysburg Tournament to be held one month after game launch featuring cash prizes. You will be listed as a Major in the game credits.

LIEUTENANT COLONEL ============================= You get the app game and a copy of the Gettysburg: The Tide Turns board game by Clash of Arms Games. Plus the Player\u2019s Guide PDF, access to the exclusive Kickstarter Gettysburg Tournament, and the Digital Rewards Pack. You will be listed as a Lieutenant Colonel in the game credits.

VETERAN MAJOR
=============================
You get the game and everything else on the VETERAN CAPTAIN level. Plus a Gettysburg: the Tide Turns T-shirt, a full-color printed Gettysburg game map, and access to the exclusive Kickstarter Gettysburg Tournament to be held one month after game launch featuring cash prizes.
You will be listed as a Major in the game credits.

NEWLY COMMISSIONED MAJOR
=============================
New to our games? This level is for you!
You get the game and everything else on the NEWLY COMMISSIONED CAPTAIN level. Plus an official Shenandoah Studio T-shirt, a Battle of the Bulge T-shirt, and PDF versions of Gettysburg and Battle of the Bulge as board games. 
You will be listed as a Major in the game credits.

LIEUTENANT COLONEL ============================= Missed the special? You can still get the board game here! You get the app game and a copy of the Gettysburg: The Tide Turns board game by Clash of Arms Games. Plus the Player\u2019s Guide PDF, access to the exclusive Kickstarter Gettysburg Tournament, and the Digital Rewards Pack. You will be listed as a Lieutenant Colonel in the game credits.

VETERAN COLONEL ============================= You get the game and a copy of the Gettysburg: The Tide Turns board game by Clash of Arms Games. Plus two T-shirts: Shenandoah Studio and Gettysburg, the Gettysburg game PDF version, the Player\u2019s Guide PDF, access to the exclusive Kickstarter Gettysburg Tournament, and the Digital Rewards Pack. You will be listed as a Colonel in the game credits.

COLONEL
=============================
You get the game and everything else on the VETERAN MAJOR level. Plus a Battle of the Bulge T-Shirt, an invitation to play a game with a member of the staff upon launch, and a custom Gettysburg Gelaskin for iPad (a custom skin for your device).
You will be listed as a Colonel in the game credits.

BRIGADIER GENERAL
=============================
You get the game and everything else on the COLONEL level. Plus a copy of the Battle of Bulge and El Alamein apps for yourself or a friend, and a limited edition printed copy of Gettysburg as a board game in classic wargame ziploc, signed by designer Eric Lee Smith. 
You will be listed as a Brigadier General in the game credits.

MAJOR GENERAL  ============================= You get the game and everything else at the BRIGADIER GENERAL LEVEL, plus: another copy of the printed board game, a PDF game version of the Battle of the Bulge, and an invitation to play a game of the app with designer Eric Lee Smith. You will be listed as a Major General in the game credits.
